subject: Super Bowl
Football
lead_paragraph: Cleveland Browns receiver Donte' Stallworth, who pleaded guilty to D.U.I. manslaughter in June, will be eligible for reinstatement after the Super Bowl in 2010.
snippet: Cleveland Browns receiver Donte' Stallworth, who pleaded guilty to D.U.I. manslaughter in June, will be eligible for reinstatement after the Super Bowl in 2010.
